subject: PS5 handbrake
description_text:
I've tried 2 different handbrakes. They're doing the same thing, the wheel
turns on but am the buttons are unresponsive. The steering wheel works
otherwise. Do you have a handbrake that will for sure work with my G29
sterling wheel?

Brandon L Cruz

conversations.body_text: Hi Brandon Cruz,  Are you using the device on a PC or a PS5? Also, could you please provide your order number and the model of the handbrake you purchased so we can assist you more effectively?

I'm just going to return it.
This is the second handbrake that I've purchased that just makes my wheel
inactive.

On Sat, Jul 12, 2025, 12:17 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Brandon Cruz,  Our device should not interfere with the G29, as it has passed EMI (Electromagnetic Interference) testing and does not emit disruptive signals. To help us better understand and resolve the issue, could you please provide a video demonstrating the problem?

The video wouldn't show more than I'm saying. I plug the steering wheel USB
into the handbrake, then the handbrake USB into my ps5. When I turn the
handbrake on, the steering wheel turns on and does it's rotating thing. But
none of the buttons work on the wheel. But the wheel, pedals, and shifter
all work without being plugged into the handbrake.

On Tue, Jul 15, 2025, 10:55 PM support@simsonn.com

If there is a solution, please let me know before I go drop this thing off
at the UPS store. Because I'd rather have it working than to return ANOTHER
handbrake
Hi Brandon Cruz,  I’ve identified the issue — our handbrake is not compatible with PS5. It currently only supports PC platforms. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused.

No.
This one is SPECIFICALLY for PS5.
I was given the link to THIS item when I returned the first handbrake.


On Thu, Jul 17, 2025, 1:54 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Brandon Cruz,    Could you please provide the Amazon link? I’ll check it for you.

https://a.co/d/0P79F31

On Thu, Jul 17, 2025, 4:16 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Brandon Cruz,  The product in this link is not from our official SIMSONN brand. Please contact the corresponding Amazon store for assistance.

I DID contact Amazon. THEY sent me this handbrake.

On Thu, Jul 17, 2025, 11:11 PM support@simsonn.com

It has NOT been resolved

On Thu, Jul 17, 2025, 11:11 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Brandon Cruz,  I think there may be a misunderstanding—this product was not purchased from our company. Please provide the Amazon order number so we can verify the details.

The Amazon order number is: 112-6779427-3059450

On Sat, Jul 19, 2025, 12:25 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Brandon Cruz,     This order was not placed through our Amazon store. Please contact the corresponding seller for assistance.

This is ridiculous

On Sat, Jul 19, 2025, 6:57 PM support@simsonn.com

No, it has not.

On Sat, Jul 19, 2025, 6:57 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Brandon Cruz,    This is not an order or product from our store. We hope you understand that we are not obligated to provide after-sales support in this case. Please contact the actual seller for assistance.
